snippet.title: REANIMAL | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A brother & sister go through hell to rescue their friends in this terrifying horror adventure. Either solo or in local and online co-op, use your wits to survive and escape this twisted island.

A new dread-filled tale from Tarsier Studios, the creators of Little Nightmares I & II - coming soon to PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S. Wishlist now!

- Links & Info -  
Website: https://reanimal.thqnordic.com
Steam: https://thqn.net/re-steam
PlayStation: https://thqn.net/re-psn
Xbox: https://thqn.net/re-xbox
